```{bash}
awk 'BEGIN{OFS="\t"; count=1} {printf "%s\t.\tlncRNA\t%d\t%d\t.\t+\t.\tgene_id \"lncRNA_%03d\";\n", $1, $2, $3, count++;}' /home/shared/8TB_HDD_01/sr320/github/deep-dive/E-Peve/output/05-lncRNA-discovery/Peve_lncRNA.bed \
| sed 's/-1/1/g' \
| sed 's/0/1/g' \
```

```{bash}

```
